public class AddCustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the Add Customer screen.

  • Method Details

    • validateCustomer

      public boolean validateCustomer(String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String phoneNumber, String country, String division)
      This method receives new customer data and checks each box for completion. If any of the boxes are empty or have invalid data, the user will receive a notification detailing the missing data.
      Parameters:
      customerName - String customerName to validate.
      address - String address to validate.
      postalCode - String postalCode to validate.
      phoneNumber - String phoneNumber to validate.
      country - String country to validate.
      division - String division to validate.
      Returns:
      boolean returns true if all data is valid. Otherwise an alert is generated detailing errors for user to correct. Will return false if data is invalid.

    • filterDivisionList

      public void filterDivisionList(String countryName) throws SQLException
      This method separates all divisions by country and then sets the division combo box based on user selection from country combo box.
      Parameters:
      countryName - String, the name of the country to use to set division combo box data.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This override of initialize includes the lambda to set the values for the country combo box. This lambda condenses the code and makes it more readable
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
